comment: Mrs. Hold is one of the sweetest ladies I have had as a teacher. Class is long and may seem boring at times, but as long as you go it is an easy A. She loves what she does, and tries to make everything easy for you.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Group projects

comment: I am taking Hold now and I am glad I did, heard the other class was a lot harder and it has been balance taking this class with my full load. make sure you do ati book for practice questions!
I loved prof hold! Getting an A in her class has been easy and it definitely made it easier to balance my other two classes. Take her!!

Ridiculously boring, and mandatory class. Tests are vague, and poorly written. Class discussion is encouraged, but if you have a differing opinion she gets offended easily. A large amount of guest speakers that are their to fill their own course requirements.
Boring teacher.  Test questions from her are hard and tricky.  Missed a lot of her questions.  They weren't on the ppt, not sure where they came from.  Too much on slides and too many slides.

Class is mandatory and terribly boring. The syllabus and actual class lectures are quite vague. The tests are hard to study for as you have no idea what to study for.The papers are grade savers. Don't bother buying the books.

Class is mandatory. It's the only way people actually show up. Does not put notes up until right before class. Test are too vague. Very nice but not very helpful or decisive. Makes students teach class through in class group projects
